content.text:
# List of honours of Portugal awarded to heads of state and royalty

This article serves as an index – as complete as possible – of all the honorific orders or similar decorations awarded by Portugal, classified by Monarchies chapter and Republics chapter, and, under each chapter, recipients' countries and the detailed list of recipients.
Awards
Monarchies
European
Belgium
*King Philippe of Belgium:
** Grand Collar of the Order of Prince Henry (GColIH, 22 October 2018)
** Grand Cross of the Military Order of Christ (GCC, 8 March 2006)
** Grand Cross of the Military Order of Aviz (GCA, 18 September 1997)
*Queen Mathilde of Belgium:
** Grand Collar of the Order of Prince Henry (GColIH, 22 October 2018)
** Grand Cross of the Military Order of Christ (GCC, 8 March 2006)
*King Albert II of Belgium, former King (19932013):
** Grand Collar of the Order of Prince Henry (GColIH, 13 December 1999)
** Grand Cross of the Military Order of Aviz (GCA, 11 December 1985)
*Queen Paola of Belgium, former Queen (19932013): Grand Cross of the Military Order of Christ (GCC, 13 December 1999)
*Princess Astrid of Belgium: Grand Cross of the Order of Prince Henry (GCIH, 8 March 2006)
*Prince Lorenz of Belgium: Grand Cross of the Order of Prince Henry (GCIH, 8 March 2006)
*Prince Laurent of Belgium: Grand Cross of the Order of Prince Henry (GCIH, 8 March 2006)
*Princess Claire of Belgium: Grand Cross of the Order of Prince Henry (GCIH, 8 March 2006)
Denmark
* Queen Margrethe II of Denmark:
** Grand Collar of the Military Order of Saint James of the Sword (GColSE, 12 October 1992)

** Grand Cross of the Military Order of Christ (GCC, 6 May 2005)

** Grand Cross of the Order of Camões (GCCa, 11 May 2022)
* Prince Guillaume, Hereditary Grand Duke of Luxembourg: Grand Cross of the Military Order of Aviz (GCA, 23 May 2017)
* Princess Stéphanie, Hereditary Grand Duchess of Luxembourg: Grand Cross of the Order of Merit (GCM, 23 May 2017)

* Pieter van Vollenhoven: Grand Cross of the Order of Prince Henry (GCIH, 14 May 1991)

* Princess Märtha Louise of Norway: Grand Cross of the Order of Prince Henry (GCIH, 13 February 2004)
* Princess Astrid, Mrs. Ferner: Grand Cross of the Order of Merit (GCM, 2 October 1981)

Oceanian
